results.idea: Momentum z-score: Short-term change vs volume
results.description: Combine price momentum and volume to capture short-term continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (mcr38_change, mcr38_volume). SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields available). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverages >0.6). SUGGESTION4: chosen fields have high userCount/alphaCount (mcr38_change userCount=344 alphaCount=1257; mcr38_volume userCount=223 alphaCount=1201). Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation short, uses 2 datafields and 2 operators. Confidence set to 0.70 based on robust coverage and strong user/alpha usage.

Weight short-term percent change by indicator strength to prioritize signals with historical reliability. S1 used two fields (mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_strength_rating). S2 not applicable. S3 not needed. S4 applied: mcr38_percent_change (userCount=130 alphaCount=625), mcr38_strength_rating (userCount=107 alphaCount=374). Respected KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence 0.65 due to moderate alphaCount.

Favor assets where short-term and long-term averages agree (trend confirmation). S1 used mcr38_shorttermpercent and mcr38_longterm_percent. S2 not applied. S3 not needed (coverage >0.6). S4: both fields have reasonable user/alphaCount. Implementation concise with 1 operator. Confidence 0.66 because cross-horizon consensus is historically useful.

Trigger short signals when recent zscore of percent_change is extreme positive and strength rating weakens. Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_strength_rating. S1 applied. S2 no vector. S3 not needed. S4 fields have solid counts. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.6; mean-reversion riskier.

Use ADX strength to filter momentum trades: prefer high adx_strength with positive short-term percent change. S1 used mcr38_adx_strength and mcr38_percent_change. S2 not used. S3 not needed. S4: adx_strength userCount=211 alphaCount=820. Implementation short. Confidence 0.68 reflecting ADX predictive value.

Confirm price jump by unusually high volume: normalize recent percent change by volume zscore. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_volume. S1 applied. S2 no. S3 not needed. S4 strong counts. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.67.

Find names where short-term percent is strong but overall strength is weak (divergence signals reversal). Used mcr38_shorttermpercent and mcr38_overall_percent. S1 used both. S2 not applied. S3 not needed. S4: both have acceptable counts. Keep implementation compact. Confidence 0.59 due to mixed signal reliability.

Use today's high-low relative to last price to detect volatility-driven breakouts. Fields: mcr38_high, mcr38_low. S1 used both. S2 not applied. Coverage OK so S3 not used. S4: mcr38_high/low userCounts ~107/83. Implementation short using divide. Confidence 0.55 because higher volatility increases risk.

Use strength of MA20 and MA100 to detect acceleration: prefer names where MA20_strength > MA100_strength. Fields: mcr38_ma_20_strength, mcr38_ma_100_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: both fields have moderate user/alpha counts. Implementation uses subtract and sign. Confidence 0.63.

Scale MACD strength by composite trendspotter strength to favor corroborated momentum. Used mcr38_macd_20_50_strength and mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: both have solid alphaCounts. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.64.

Use CCI_40 strength with recent percent change zscore to detect reversion. Fields: mcr38_cci_40_strength, mcr38_percent_change. S1 used. S2 not applicable. S3 not needed. S4 counts acceptable. Implementation uses ts_zscore and multiply. Confidence 0.58.

Exploit BB strength that indicates breakout potential combined with percent change momentum. Fields: mcr38_bb_strength, mcr38_percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: bb_strength has userCount=105 alphaCount=305. Implementation short. Confidence 0.62.

Combine short, medium and long term percent signals into a single composite score. Used mcr38_shorttermpercent and mcr38_longterm_percent (two fields to keep implementation within limits). S1 applied (multi-field). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: both fields have respectable counts. Implementation uses add and divide. Confidence 0.65.

Use ADX strength multiplied by volume to favor strong-trend high-liquidity names. Fields: mcr38_adx_strength, mcr38_volume. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: both fields high counts. Implementation simple multiply. Confidence 0.69.

Measure persistence by change vs value d days ago on percent change to favor consistent movers. Field: mcr38_percent_change (single). S1 partially applied (one main field). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 alphaCount acceptable. Implementation short and within limits. Confidence 0.6.

Cross-sectionally zscore overall_percent to rank names by consensus strength. Field: mcr38_overall_percent. S1 minimal (one field). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation uses zscore. Confidence 0.63.

Favor names with recent positive percent change but low last price (potential mispricing). Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_last. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4: mcr38_last userCount=238 alphaCount=1943 strong. Implementation uses divide. Confidence 0.56 (price alone noisy).

Multiply medium-term percent by trendspotter_strength to keep trades aligned with composite trend. Fields: mcr38_mediumterm_percent, mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation lean. Confidence 0.66.

Short when shorttermpercent is high but shortterm signal strength is dropping (weakening). Fields: mcr38_shorttermpercent, mcr38_shorttermsignal (avoid categoricalâ€”use percent and strength instead). Here use shorttermpercent and shortterm percent strength proxy mcr38_shorttermpercent (self-diff). S1 applied using percent and its ts_delta. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 chosen high counts. Implementation compact using ts_delta. Confidence 0.54 (higher noise).

Use ratio of MA50_strength to MA100_strength to detect acceleration of trend. Fields: mcr38_ma_50_strength, mcr38_ma_100_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts moderate. Implementation uses divide. Confidence 0.62.

Require agreement between MACD strength and MAHILO strength for robust trend picks. Fields: mcr38_macd_50_100_strength, mcr38_mahilo_strength. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both have moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Para50 momentum scaled by overall strength
results.description: Scale PARA_50 strength by overall_percent to favor systemic agreement. Fields: mcr38_para_50_strength, mcr38_overall_percent. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both with decent counts. Implementation simple multiply. Confidence 0.64.

Adjust momentum by recent kurtosis to downweight fat-tailed movers. Fields: mcr38_percent_change and use ts_kurtosis on it. S1 effectively single field plus ts op. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 percent_change has good counts. Implementation uses ts_kurtosis and divide. Confidence 0.57.

Combine BB strength and ADX strength to select breakout names with sustained trend. Fields: mcr38_bb_strength, mcr38_adx_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both have solid alphaCounts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.68.

Use ts_sign of macd strength delta to capture consistent momentum direction. Field: mcr38_macd_20_50_strength. S1 minimal (one field). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation uses ts_delta and sign. Confidence 0.6.

Trade names with high percent change zscore when volume zscore also surges. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_volume. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both high counts. Implementation uses min to require both strong. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term percent scaled by ADX direction
results.description: Use ADX direction (numeric 1-5) to scale momentum: stronger directional ADX increases weight. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_adx_direction. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 adx_direction userCount=232 alphaCount=748. Implementation simple multiply. Confidence 0.65.

Short extreme zscore of overall_percent when strength_rating is low. Fields: mcr38_overall_percent, mcr38_strength_rating. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation uses ts_zscore and multiply with reverse. Confidence 0.58.

Use information ratio of percent_change time series to find consistent movers. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal (single field). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation uses ts_ir. Confidence 0.68 as IR is strong persistence metric.

Detect low vec-like volatility using high-low range vs last price then expect breakout when percent_change surges. Fields: mcr38_high, mcr38_low (range) paired with mcr38_percent_change. To respect 2-datafield limit combine high/low into single operator call then use percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts OK. Implementation uses ts_max_diff concept via subtract and divide. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after spike in volume
results.description: Short names with large positive percent_change but extreme volume zscore (possible exhaustion). Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_volume. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 strong counts. Implementation uses sign and zscore. Confidence 0.55 (risk of misreading news-driven spikes).

Rank names by ratio of mediumterm_percent to longterm_percent to find accelerating assets. Fields: mcr38_mediumterm_percent, mcr38_longterm_percent. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 acceptable counts. Implementation uses divide. Confidence 0.62.

Multiply MA50 strength acceleration with trendspotter_strength for robust picks. Fields: mcr38_ma_50_strength, mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation uses ts_delta on ma50 strength and multiply. Confidence 0.66.

Cross-sectional quantile of MACD_strength to pick top decile momentum names. Field: mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not. S4 moderate counts. Implementation uses quantile. Confidence 0.64.

Find names with high percent_change but low trendspotter_strength (contrarian). Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both have good counts. Implementation subtract ratio. Confidence 0.57.

Use MAHILO strength scaled by recent high-low range to prefer stable trending names. Fields: mcr38_mahilo_strength, mcr38_high (use low indirectly via last). S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply with inverse range. Confidence 0.6.

Simple ts_zscore on shorttermpercent to capture extreme short-term movers. Field: mcr38_shorttermpercent. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts moderate. Implementation uses ts_zscore. Confidence 0.61.

Average longterm, mediumterm and shortterm percents into a consensus (use two fields only: overall_percent and shorttermpercent to respect limit). S1 used two fields. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 fields high counts. Implementation average. Confidence 0.63.

Scale percent change by ADX direction strength to favor moves with strengthening trend. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_adx_direction. S1 applied. S2 no. S3 not needed. S4 ADX directional field has strong counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.67.

Downweight percent_change by strength_rating to avoid weak-signal volatility. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_strength_rating. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.59.

Use short-term returns acceleration to pick accelerating assets. Field: mcr38_last (use ts_returns). S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 mcr38_last has high counts. Implementation uses ts_returns and ts_delta. Confidence 0.62.

Favor MACD strength where recent price volatility low (stable momentum). Fields: mcr38_macd_50_100_strength, use volatility approximated by subtract high-low and last. S1 applied with two fields (macd_strength and high). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.6.

Find assets where PARA_50 strength deviates from mediumterm_percent average indicating regime change. Fields: mcr38_para_50_strength, mcr38_mediumterm_percent. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation subtract. Confidence 0.58.

Use ts_delta of cci_60_strength to capture rising momentum in CCI. Field: mcr38_cci_60_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 cci_60_strength has good alphaCount. Implementation ts_delta. Confidence 0.59.
Zscore the overall strength rating to pick statistically strong names. Field: mcr38_strength_rating. S1 minimal. S2 no. S3 not. S4 good counts. Implementation zscore. Confidence 0.63.

Use ts_av_diff to measure departure from recent mean and trade reversion/continuation accordingly. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation ts_av_diff. Confidence 0.61.

Multiply shorttermsignal proxy (shorttermpercent) by volume to prefer liquid confirmations. Fields: mcr38_shorttermpercent, mcr38_volume. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 high counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.65.

Difference between two MACD strengths to detect accelerating momentum. Fields: mcr38_macd_20_50_strength, mcr38_macd_50_100_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both available. Implementation subtract. Confidence 0.62.

Multiply short percent_change zscore by trendspotter_strength to find breakout picks with composite confirmation. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 trendspotter_strength has moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.66.

Use very low last price with large negative percent_change as reversal candidate. Fields: mcr38_last, mcr38_percent_change. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 mcr38_last high counts. Implementation inverse(last)*percent. Confidence 0.52 (higher risk).

Multiply overall_percent by percent_change to favor moves with broad agreement. Fields: mcr38_overall_percent, mcr38_percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both decent. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: TS arg max momentum freshest peak
results.description: Use ts_arg_max on percent_change to prefer names at recent peak of activity. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation ts_arg_max. Confidence 0.58.

Divide trendspotter_strength by recent volume to prefer strong signals in lighter names (contrarian liquidity play). Fields: mcr38_trendspotter_strength, mcr38_volume. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both with counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.54.
Zscore MA50 strength to find outliers in moving-average-based momentum. Field: mcr38_ma_50_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation ts_zscore. Confidence 0.63.

Require PARA_50 strength to agree with MACD_20_100_strength for robust trend names via multiply. Fields: mcr38_para_50_strength, mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.65.

Compute departure of percent_change from recent mean to detect unusual moves. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 high counts. Implementation ts_av_diff. Confidence 0.6.

Ratio of shorttermpercent to longterm_percent to find accelerating trends. Fields: mcr38_shorttermpercent, mcr38_longterm_percent. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both available. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.62.
Detect rising ADX_strength via ts_delta to capture trend onset. Field: mcr38_adx_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation ts_delta. Confidence 0.66.

Difference between MA20_strength and MA50_strength to find crossover acceleration. Fields: mcr38_ma_20_strength, mcr38_ma_50_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation subtract. Confidence 0.61.

Normalize percent_change zscore by volume to prefer meaningful moves. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_volume. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 high counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.65.

Detect names where direction_rating (1-10) deviates from strength_rating indicating structural shift. Fields: mcr38_direction_rating, mcr38_strength_rating. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both present. Implementation subtract. Confidence 0.58.

Use high-low relative to last price times percent_change to capture intraday breakout strength. Fields: mcr38_high, mcr38_percent_change. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts OK. Implementation multiply ratio. Confidence 0.6.

Short when bb_strength strong but percent_change negative (failed breakout). Fields: mcr38_bb_strength, mcr38_percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply with reverse sign. Confidence 0.56.
Cross-sectional quantile of MA100 strength to pick top momentum names. Field: mcr38_ma_100_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation quantile. Confidence 0.63.

Use ts_ir on macd_20_100_strength to find persistent momentum signals. Field: mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 alphaCount strong. Implementation ts_ir. Confidence 0.67.

Trade when PARA_50 strength significant relative to overall_percent to find idiosyncratic moves. Fields: mcr38_para_50_strength, mcr38_overall_percent. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short squeeze potential: low float proxy
results.description: Proxy low-float by low last price and sudden volume surge: divide volume zscore by last price and multiply percent_change. Fields: mcr38_volume, mcr38_last, mcr38_percent_change (but limit 2 fields: use volume and last, and ts_zscore percent change indirectly via last). To respect 2-field limit use volume and last with ts_returns(last). S1 used (two fields). S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts OK. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.53.
Zscore trendspotter_strength to pick outlier trends. Field: mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation zscore. Confidence 0.64.

Multiply CCI_60 strength with percent_change to favor strong-CCI momentum. Fields: mcr38_cci_60_strength, mcr38_percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.62.

Select assets where mahilo_strength and macd_20_50_strength agree (multiply). Fields: mcr38_mahilo_strength, mcr38_macd_20_50_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both available. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.65.

Measure ts_ir of shorttermpercent to find consistently trending names in short horizon. Field: mcr38_shorttermpercent. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate. Implementation ts_ir. Confidence 0.66.

Multiply adx_strength and macd_20_100_strength to favor strong directional momentum with MACD confirmation. Fields: mcr38_adx_strength, mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.69.
Apply linear decay to recent percent_change to capture recentness. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation ts_decay_linear. Confidence 0.6.

Combine BB strength with MA50 strength to capture volatility breakout on trending names. Fields: mcr38_bb_strength, mcr38_ma_50_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after MA strength drop
results.description: Short names where MA50 strength decreases (ts_delta negative) while percent_change positive. Fields: mcr38_ma_50_strength, mcr38_percent_change (but keep 2 fields: ma50 and percent). S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation multiply reverse. Confidence 0.55.

Use ts_max_diff style by taking macd strength minus its recent max to detect fade or extension. Field: mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation ts_max_diff. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Overall percent momentum scaled by volume
results.description: Multiply overall_percent by volume zscore to prefer strong consensus in liquid names. Fields: mcr38_overall_percent, mcr38_volume. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both good counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.67.
Rank PARA_50 strength over time to find recent leaders. Field: mcr38_para_50_strength. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation ts_rank. Confidence 0.61.

Use ts_arg_min on direction_rating to find recent lows in directional consensus that may reverse. Field: mcr38_direction_rating. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation ts_arg_min. Confidence 0.57.

Combine MACD and ADX strengths then divide by recent high-low range to favor strong breakouts with low volatility noise. Fields: mcr38_macd_20_100_strength, mcr38_adx_strength, mcr38_high (but limit to 2 fields: macd and adx used; approximate range via ma strength omitted). S1 applied with two fields. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.68.

Bucket short-term percent_change into quantiles for robust cross-sectional ranking. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 high counts. Implementation quantile. Confidence 0.62.
Apply hump to overall_percent to reduce turnover and focus on persistent signals. Field: mcr38_overall_percent. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 counts OK. Implementation hump. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply MA50_strength and MACD_20_100_strength to require two independent trend signals. Fields: mcr38_ma_50_strength, mcr38_macd_20_100_strength. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.67.

Find names where percent_change positive but shorttermpercent low (divergence). Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_shorttermpercent. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation subtract normalized values. Confidence 0.56.

Multiply trendspotter_strength and overall_percent to favor widely-agreed trends. Fields: mcr38_trendspotter_strength, mcr38_overall_percent. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.66.
Detect unusual volume by dividing today's volume by ts_mean(volume,30). Field: mcr38_volume. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 high counts. Implementation divide. Confidence 0.6.

Identify names where CCI_40_strength diverges from MA20_strength indicating possible regime shift. Fields: mcr38_cci_40_strength, mcr38_ma_20_strength. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation subtract. Confidence 0.58.

Scale percent_change by strength_rating to favor high-quality moves. Fields: mcr38_percent_change, mcr38_strength_rating. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 both available. Implementation multiply normalized. Confidence 0.65.

Use ts_product on percent_change to find persistent compounding momentum over short window. Field: mcr38_percent_change. S1 minimal. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation ts_product. Confidence 0.62.

Multiply MAHILO strength and overall_percent to favor trend confirmed by high-low MA. Fields: mcr38_mahilo_strength, mcr38_overall_percent. S1 used. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 moderate counts. Implementation multiply. Confidence 0.64.

Require ADX strength ts_delta positive and percent_change positive using two fields: mcr38_adx_strength and mcr38_percent_change. S1 applied. S2 not. S3 not needed. S4 good counts. Implementation multiply sign of delta with percent zscore. Confidence 0.67.
